message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_MODIFY_PROVIDER_SERVICE_CENTER
message.locale: The Provider Service Center for this Service Center Provider Service cannot be modified.
The Provider Service Centre for this Service Centre Provider Service cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_MODIFY_PROVIDER_OFFERING_ID
message.locale: The Provider Offering for this Service Center Provider Service cannot be modified.
The Provider Offering for this Service Centre Provider Service cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_CENTER_OFFERING_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_SERVICE_CENTER_START_DATE
message.locale: The service center provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the service center Start Date, %2d.
The service centre provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the service centre Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_CENTER_OFFERING_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_PROVIDER_OFFERING_START_DATE
message.locale: The service center provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider service Start Date, %2d.
The service centre provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider service Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_CENTER_OFFERING_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_SERVICE_CENTER_END_DATE
message.locale: The service center provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the service center End Date, %2d.
The service centre provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the service centre End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_CENTER_OFFERING_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_PROVIDER_OFFERING_END_DATE
message.locale: The service center provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the provider service End Date, %2d.
The service centre provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the provider service End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_CENTER_OFFERING_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_SERVICE_CENTER_END_DATE
message.locale: The service center provider service End Date, %1d, must be on or before the service center End Date, %2d.
The service centre provider service End Date, %1d, must be on or before the service centre End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_CENTER_OFFERING_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_PROVIDER_OFFERING_END_DATE
message.locale: The service center provider service End Date, %1d, must be on or before the provider service End Date, %2d.
The service centre provider service End Date, %1d, must be on or before the provider service End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_START_DATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Start Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_STATUS_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Status must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Service' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_ONLY_APPROVED_PROVIDER_OFFERINGS
message.locale: Only Provider Offerings with a status of 'Approved' can be added to this service center.
Only Provider Offerings with a status of 'Approved' can be added to this service centre.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_FV_NO_PROVIDER_OFFERINGS_PLACE
message.locale: Provider Offerings having unit of measure 'Place' can not be added to this service center.
Provider Offerings having unit of measure 'Place' can not be added to this service centre.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_DATES_OVERLAPPING
message.locale: This service, %1s, is already associated with this service center from %2d.
This service, %1s, is already associated with this service centre from %2d.

message.name: ERR_SERVICECENTERPROVIDEROFFERING_DATES_OVERLAPPING_END_DATE
message.locale: This service, %1s, is already associated with this service center from %2d to %3d.
This service, %1s, is already associated with this service centre from %2d to %3d.
